hero.title: Frozen Creamery N’ Garden
hero.description: A place where indulgence and balance share the same space  handcrafted ice creams and farm-fresh salads made with love every day.

items.title: Origins Across the World
items.description: “Our story began across continents—in Dubai, Amsterdam, and England—where a chef discovered that food could be more than just a meal.”

items.title: The Realization
items.description: “Food can weave memories, spark smiles, and connect people in ways words never could.”

items.title: The Pairing
items.description: Two dishes remained timeless: the innocence of ice creams and the freshness of salads. In 2015, they finally came together.

items.title: The First Shop
items.description: Many questioned the pairing, but laughter over melting cups and the clink of salad bowls proved balance and indulgence can live together.

items.title: Canada & Niagara
items.description: “Life brought us to Canada. Niagara gave us new flavours, new friends, and the dream of Frozen Creamery N’ Garden.”

items.title: Today’s Vision
items.description: “More than a shop, it’s a place where cones hold memories, bowls spark fresh beginnings, and strangers leave as friends.”
